messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle play option sent monday october re play option hi think needs someone probably supported by look computer ad those her colleagues because there clearly something configured differently her computer maybe others compared with computer she tried remotely was able work out why none web browsers her computer could active play button education web site flash seemed be available chrome for example but still would work but might very well have missed something someone could spend more problem might spot sorry really much answer kind regards sent october play option dear could you kindly advise whom we can address looking forward hearing you thank you very much regards analyst ext hub sent monday october re play option yes did also had meeting with could find explanation or resolution senior tester sent monday october play option dear could you kindly advised whether you have followed steps attached could find another thread after th looking forward hearing you thank you very much regards analyst ext hub sent monday october re play option hello could please have investigation resolution issue thank you senior tester sent wednesday play option hello we have accounts related but seems be something wrong with our since play button courses always disable remote session with located when trying connect with worked perfectly how appears tested virtual machine also with colleague same senior tester
